name: Documentation Standards
description: Comprehensive documentation for code and systems
principles: DOCUMENT WHY, NOT JUST WHAT - Explain reasoning
KEEP DOCS WITH CODE - Documentation next to code
UPDATE DOCS WITH CODE - Stale docs are worse than no docs
USE CLEAR EXAMPLES - Show, don't just tell
DOCUMENT PUBLIC APIs THOROUGHLY - Public interfaces need detail
INCLUDE EDGE CASES - Document what happens in unusual situations

documentation_types.inline_comments: Explain complex logic, not obvious code
